description:
CRUSH™3D: an innovative new puzzle-platform game for Nintendo 3DS from SEGA and Zoë Mode which will have you thinking outside the box before you can say “splat”.

Danny needs your help, he’s stuck inside the C.R.U.S.H. machine, wandering worlds made from his own worries – he needs guidance from someone with the moxie to discover the right route through the tangled worlds of his imagination. Help him out in CRUSH™3D, only on Nintendo 3DS.

* Crush from three dimensions to two (and back) to solve puzzles

* Play through over 50 mind-boggling levels and get to the exit door

* Exchange gifts with friends via StreetPass to unlock extras

* Amass collectables to access exclusive artwork and more!
name: CRUSH™3D
